name: Idiopathic Mesenteric Panniculitis
chief_complaint: I've had severe abdominal pain and bloating for weeks, and I'm losing weight without trying
prognosis: Variable; may have recurrent flares but generally non-life threatening with treatment
description: A rare inflammatory condition affecting the mesenteric fat tissue, characterized by chronic inflammation, fibrosis, and fat necrosis. Often idiopathic but may be associated with autoimmune disorders or malignancy. Diagnosis requires exclusion of other causes of mesenteric abnormalities.
